snippet.title: [PS1] PAL: Shinken Densetsu - old-school RPG from Fill-in-Cafe
snippet.description:
PAL: Shinken Densetsu is a role-playing game from the (now sadly defunct) Japanese developer Fill-in-Cafe which was responsible for such titles as Panzer Bandit, Community Pom and Mad Stalker. It features SNES-style 2D graphics with a slightly muted color palette, a turned-based battle system and a distinctive concept which marries modern world setting with supernatural elements. You play as a dog turned male warrior who vows to rescue his former owner, schoolgirl Kaoru, from the clutches of the evil Lord Nostradamus and his cohorts.

What the game's turn-based battles look like: 21:20
